demand.question: Do you have an estimate of the total amount of land cover change over your area of interest?

no.question: Is past land cover change a good proxy for the amount of future change (same rate of change)?

outcome.action: Use jurisdictional estimates from IPCC RCP scenarios

yes.question: Do you have a national/regional land cover map for multiple years?

outcome.action: Use a local/regional land cover map to estimate rates of change
Use a global land cover map to estimate rates of change
